seed_phrase_page.seed_copied: The seed phrase was copied successfully
seed_phrase_page.subtitle: It is the only way to import or restore your account, so copy, download, print and store it safely!
seed_phrase_page.title: Store your seed phrase

warning.label: Never share your seed phrase with anyone.
warning.text1: Anyone with this phrase can take your Decs forever.
warning.text2: We won’t be able to recover it or return your account and wallet to you.
warning.text3: If you’ll lose the seed phrase you’ll lose your account forever.

errors.account_conflict: A wallet has already been created for this email or wallet address

hint.label: Decentr can't recover your seed phrase!

success_page.subtitle: Keep your seed phrase safe and remember that's the only key to all you have on Decentr.

tips.tip1: Save backup in multiple places and never share the phrase with anyone.
tips.tip2: Be careful of fishing! Decentr will never spontaneously ask for your seed phrase.
tips.tip3: If you ever have questions or see something fishy, email support@decentr.net.

success_page.title: Congratulations, you're all set!
